mapper.select: SELECT PNO, PNAME, PPRICE, PCONTENT, PCNAME FROM PRODUCT P, PCATEGORY C WHERE P.PTYPE = C.PCTYPE
SELECT PNO, PNAME, PPRICE, PCONTENT, PCNAME FROM PRODUCT P, PCATEGORY C WHERE P.PTYPE = C.PCTYPE AND P.PNO = #{pno}
SELECT PNO, PNAME, PPRICE, PCONTENT, PCNAME FROM PRODUCT P, PCATEGORY C WHERE P.PTYPE = C.PCTYPE AND C.PCTYPE = #{cno}
SELECT PNO, PNAME, PPRICE, PCONTENT, PCNAME FROM PRODUCT P, PCATEGORY C WHERE P.PTYPE = C.PCTYPE
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT P, ( SELECT * FROM CART WHERE USERID = #{userId} ) B WHERE P.PNO = B.PNO
